It's time for the scene to move on to x264. A 2,5 hours movie like this would look so much better with x264 even in a smaller 700MB size.
Big monitors show the shortcomings of XVID, color banding, blocks, it becomes distracting after you've watched 720p BRrips with excellent quality in the standard 700MB release size from the XVID era.
